skillTree.localised_description: A mighty steed long of leg and wide of girth, taller than a man and possessed of a fiery spirit, this warhorse is the personal mount of Grigori.

ui_effects.localised_text: A Guardian Spirit comes to aid Grigori
Spawned unit fights in this battle only

skillTree.localised_description: Rest is for the weak; one must harry the enemy in relentless pursuit and leave them no time to regroup.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Naught can penetrate the swirling mists of ice and sleet that churn around those afforded Father Bear's protection.
This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Grigori has a mouth on him, and it's one that no opponent can resist, even against their will. He's just that irritating.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: Ever since the Norsca first raided his village, Grigori has made it a personal mission to see the Chaos-worshipping dogs whipped back to their homes. He doesn't mind smashing a demon or two along the way, either.

effects.description:
Leadership: +3 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Norsca
	(all units in army)

Melee attack: +5 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs and Norsca
	(all units in army)

Leadership: +6 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Norsca
	(all units in army)

Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs and Norsca
	(all units in army)

Leadership: +9 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Norsca
	(all units in army)

Melee attack: +15 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs and Norsca
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: The people of Kislev need every bit of help they can get. And Grigori, for all that he doesn't think of himself as a leader, is a damn good leader.

effects.description:
Passive ability: "Stand Firm" for Kossovite units.
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: The sweet nectar of the Kislevites restores and warms, rehabilitating the body and soul of the drinker.
During one of his travels to the frigid north Grigori was led to safety by a wolf spirit. Since that day, the spirit comes to save him anytime he is in danger.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Speaking words of power or faith can alter perceptions on the battlefield.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
Never to be broken or dishonoured - never to succumb to the foe.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

ui_effects.localised_text: A Guardian Spirit comes to aid Grigori
Spawned unit fights in this battle only

backgroundSkills.localised_description: A muscular Kislevite, raised in his father's forge, Grigori came of age when he slew his first Norscan by choking the life from the foul savage with his bare hands.

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -15% for Kossovite units.
	(all units in army)
